translated: Homage to that Blessed One, perfected one, fully awakened Buddha.
Praise of the Suttas
The teaching of the meaning of the Dhamma is penetrating,
Fourfold, profound, difficult to see;🔽I pay homage to the King of the Dhamma,
Who teaches the Dhamma to the world;
The Buddha, the Paccekabuddha,
The Arahant, the Wheel-turning Monarch;
I praise the one worthy of a stupa,
Among the four worthy of a stupa;
The one dear to ghosts, the sensualist,
The lion-like one, the Tathāgata;🔽I pay homage to the Victor,
